data.name: Tvö
data.detailed_description:
Decipher the puzzles of an ancient maze to save your soul.


You and your partner awake on separate sides of a mysterious maze. Surrounded by shadows, spectral whispers, and magical orbs that help you communicate with each other, the two of you must traverse the winding corridors and find a way out. The only question that remains… will your soul be saved?



Tvö is a cooperative puzzle game. Two players find themselves trapped on opposite sides of an elaborate maze. Together, they must solve puzzles hidden in its depths in order to discover a way out. Both sides of the maze have their own secrets that the players can find.

Communicate

Only your words and wits can save you now.



Through floating orbs, the mysterious maze lets you talk to your partner on the other side. Use your communication skills to solve the puzzles you will face.

Solve

The way to salvation is teeming with trials.



Work together with your partner to unravel the puzzles laid throughout the maze. What your partner experiences will be crucial to your success.

Atmosphere

You and your partner are not alone…



Explore the corridors of the maze to find those that came before, and those that still remain. Immerse yourself in the dark ambience of the maze.

data.short_description: Tvö is an online cooperative puzzle game where two players must use their wits and communication skills to find a way into the heart of the labyrinth. This game can be played using our in-game voice chat or a third-party option.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ / AMD Ryzen 5 3500C or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon R9 270X or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone is suggested
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3500X or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / Radeon RX 6600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone is suggested

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
